name: Equipment installation
description: Trainees should become familiar with the equipment they are going to install. This includes understanding its components, functions, and specifications.

name: Windmill Energy
description: Wind energy is considered a clean and environmentally friendly source of electricity because it produces no greenhouse gas emissions or air pollutants.

name: Equipment Maintenance
description: Trainees should be trained in the proper use of tools and equipment required for installation. This includes knowing how to use hand tools and power tools.

name: Offshore Engineering
description: Offshore engineering also encompasses the design of subsea pipelines, wellheads, and other infrastructure components that are placed on or below the seabed.

name: Electrical Wiring
description: These components are used to join conductors and devices together. Examples include wire nuts, terminal blocks, and electrical connectors.

name: Safety Training
description: Safety training is not a one-time event. It encourages ongoing learning and improvement in safety practices.
